Formale attribuzione di incarichi di ins.content: University of Benghazi, Libya, Faculty of Economics, Master in Finance (Visiting Professor 2010)
Visiting Research Fellow, Quantitative Finance Research Center, School of Finance and Economics, University of Technology, Sydney, Australia.
Ecole Supérieure des affaires (ESA) Beirut, Lebanon, Visiting Professor, Executive Master in Financial Management

Organizzazione o partecipazione come rel.content: Australasian Finance and Banking Conference 2005, UNSW, Sydney, Australia, paper presented: “Conference calls and volatility: evidence from the US high tech market”.
European Financial Management Association 2009, Annual Meeting, Bocconi University, Milan, Member of the Organizing Committee.

Financial Engineering and Banking Society 2012, 2nd International Conference of the Financial Engineering and Banking Society, ESCP Business School, London, UK. Paper presented: "Grandstanding and Spinning in VC backed IPOs on AIM UK".
European Financial Management Association 2012, Annual Meeting, University of Barcelona, Barcelona, Spain. Paper presented: "Grandstanding and Spinning in VC backed IPOs on AIM UK".
European Financial Management Association 2015, Annual Meeting, Nyenrode Business University, Amsterdam, Netherlands, Member of the Program Committee.
World Finance Conference 2016, St Johns University New York. Paper presented: “Debt Specialization in different financial systems”.

Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Relationship lending, credit market concentration and the cost of debt. Research Coordinator. International research team: Dell'Acqua A. (Bocconi University), Kysucky V. (Shenzen University), Bonini S. (Stevens Institute of Technology, NY), Fungo M. (Bocconi University). Research Grant: € 7.500. SDA Bocconi School of Management, Claudio Demattè Research Division. 2014-2015.

Conseguimento di premi e riconoscimenti.content: Miglior caso didattico dell’anno, DIR “Claudio Demattè” Research Division, SDA Bocconi per l'anno 2003
Miglior articolo pubblicato su Economia & Management, SDA Bocconi nel 2006, per la pubblicazione dal titolo " I venture capitalist italiani: chi sono, cosa fanno e cosa vogliono"
Miglior caso didattico multimediale dell’anno, DIR “Claudio Demattè” Research Division, SDA Bocconi per l'anno 2006
